n0:runOracleScript.n0:source: prompt --application/shared_components/security/authentications/application_express_authentication begin -- Manifest -- AUTHENTICATION: Application Express Authentication -- Manifest End wwv_flow_api.component_begin ( p_version_yyyy_mm_dd=>'2021.04.15' ,p_release=>'21.1.0' ,p_default_workspace_id=>2600336800070006 ,p_default_application_id=>100 ,p_default_id_offset=>6700447157474117 ,p_default_owner=>'TIME_TRACKER' ); wwv_flow_api.create_authentication( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(17487826341514479) ,p_name=>'Application Express Authentication' ,p_scheme_type=>'NATIVE_APEX_ACCOUNTS' ,p_invalid_session_type=>'LOGIN' ,p_use_secure_cookie_yn=>'N' ,p_ras_mode=>0 ); wwv_flow_api.component_end; end;
